hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.17 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/24.0.1312.57 Safari/537.17
hopobject.body:
The Next BeagleBone: Better, Stronger, Faster, Cheaper

Everything you love about the BeagleBone plus what you wished it originally had:

  • Lower price
  • Higher performance
  • Onboard HDMI
  • Onboard DDR3
  • Onboard eMMC flash

Plus, it will debut in a bright new color just in time for spring!

Ready to get your hands on it before anyone else? Sign up with the distributor below to show your interest and you'll be the first to know when to order it. Initial quantities are limited and demand is high! So don't delay, sign up today!
